text: “Gu khar nde nzuai bigi, nta zumgum hɨrga, mbe fharav nden suigɨ ŋgɨv tɨvi mbatɨgi guarira nden muunga. Mbe Zudaiŋ, mbe nde ndigi ŋgɨp, Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi pheni vhen ŋgirɨp, nde suaŋ suaŋv, nde ndi bɨna surga. Mbe vhɨra nde na zɨn vuim, mbe na zɨ mbevɨrga ne suaŋv, nde ndi ŋgɨp wari won ŋgui gari gumgir pani nɨman fɨv, nde suaŋv mbe suaŋv, mbe vhɨra wari won gumgir pani nɨman nde suaŋv suanga.
